name: BURNING STARS
description:
this is a game about making choices; you'll spend your last few minutes alive choosing how to spend them. most choices are final.

please let me know if you run into any seemingly errant routes!

how to play:

click buttons to advance through dialogue branches.
click escape at any time to exit the title; you might have to give it a few seconds before it actually closes.

credits:

  • all image assets are made by me.
  • music credit goes to Pearce Wilson King's "Space Atmosphere".
  • font credits:
